Articles.Content: I'm just excited for the KSP community to be reinvigorated. It will be like old times :)
I pray that hard lithobraking won't result in the game freezing for a minute while it figures out the physics.

This is one small stumble for Jeb Kerman, and one giant fumble for Kerbal kind! 

I am excited for the new graphics and expanded horizons!

Yay!

Nice giveaway here.

I am exited to hear some new Kerbal's voices ...
I'm excited for the new planets and revamped kerbol!
I'm exited for multiplayer. If BDArmory returns, the battles will be legendary!

Heck yeah I'm looking forward to it! I think I'm most excited about optimizations, updated physics engine, new parts inspired by KSP1 mods, and new planetary details!  If I had to pick one? That's really hard. I'm thinking optimizations and better loading times!
I'm excited for all the new cool colors/paint schemes we'll be able to add to our spacecrafts!

WHEEEEEEEEEEEEEE   SPACEPLAAAAAAAAAAAAANES   

Edited February 23, 2023 by dvimidh
Excited for the new graphics and science!
I'm ultra hyped for the procedural wings and new UI, this game is awesome and I can't wait to play.
I am Excited for better physical effects, a higher degree of automation and multiprocessing to experience "modern" space travel first hand.
I am exited to see the new ways to build rockets and play multiplayer

Welp, I'm excited for new installment as a whole, hopefully eradicating old krakens and probably bringing new ones. Hard to tell by the videos, but it looks like the game "feel" might be a whole lot better (sort of like upgrade from Mount&Blade to Bannerlord).

And of course colonies and exploration.
As good as this game seems it will be, I'm excited to see what the modding community cooks up.
Ive had this on my wishlist since 2019. Im excited for the new visuals and parts (also agency colors). Its gonna be like ksp EA (back in 2013) but more modern!
I can’t wait for the resource management element of the game, since I never got to doing that in ksp1.. hopefully I’ll do that here!..
I am excited to start a new journey again and feel in awe like the first time I opened KSP
I'm just excited for the game to come out lol
I'm excited to make planes with the new procedurally generated wings!
I am excited for exploring all the different new worlds and the soundtracks of each and every one of them!

The aspect of colonization combined with the multiplayer feature is something I've always wanted to come to fruition, being able to interact with other players as well as learn from one another is an amazing thing to take part in. Whether I win or not I am so excited to finally play this game with all of the new features and systems... I don't even know where to start lol. I have a feeling it will be more amazing than the first ksp because  It will be like playing ksp all over again for the first time, only with more improvements than I can hope for and more.
Career mode
Im excited about the orthographic views! I've always wanted to be able to precisely make crafts, and it feels much more in-line with actual CAD software.
I am excited to explore the new landmarks in the kerbol system
